alert.note: Alert for Adams; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:42PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PHELPS...NORTHWESTERN ADAMS...NORTHERN KEARNEY AND SOUTHERN BUFFALO COUNTIES... At 742 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Gibbon to near Odessa, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Gibbon around 750 PM CDT. Kearney around 755 PM CDT. Heartwell around 810 PM CDT. Kenesaw around 815 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 255 and 292. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
